content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. Let's focus on discussing the rental price for now. I have high expectations but am open to negotiation. Please propose a price that you find suitable. If we reach an agreement with the number you suggest, I'll confirm it as '[x] Euro!' Otherwise, I'll let you know if I cannot continue the negotiation due to certain reasons. TERMINATE when we conclude our price discussion, whether we reach an agreement or not.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
